attributes.action: Prevent banks from (a) charging for cash withdrawals from ATM machines at any time when up to now they are free, and (b) prevent banks from stopping free bank accounts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
(a) Currently, cash withdrawals are free from 'link'ed ATM machines on the High Street - prevent greedy banks from introducing any form of charge for any cash withdrawal from these ATM machines.
(b) The majority of bank current  accounts are free to operate and most people have one of these types of account - prevent the greedy banks from introducing any form of fee which users of these types of accounts would be forced to pay.
